testcase.classname: Login into T24 and create a buy order
testcase.name: Login to the application with user one
testcase.system-out: Given The user is able to login with valid "username" and with valid "password".passed Then Click on login button..................................................passed

testcase.classname: Login into T24 and create a buy order
testcase.name: Create a new order with user one
testcase.system-out: Given The user is in the new order creation window..........................passed When Fill the fields required to complete the sell order in front office....passed And Validate the entered fields in front office.............................passed Then Commit the front office order and logout...............................passed

testcase.classname: Login into T24 and create a buy order
testcase.name: Approve the order with user two
testcase.system-out: Given The user is logged and in the approval window of front office.........passed When The transaction number is passed in the commandline as one of the parameters.passed Then Execute the front office order.........................................passed

testcase.classname: Login into T24 and create a buy order
testcase.name: Broker details are entered
testcase.system-out: Given The user is in Middle office page.....................................passed When The middle office orders parameters are passed in the command line.....passed And Fill the fields for completing the order in middle office...............passed And Validate the entered fields in middle office............................passed Then Commit the middle office order and logout..............................passed

testcase.classname: Login into T24 and create a buy order
testcase.name: Approve the order with user two
testcase.system-out: Given The user is logged in the approval window of middle office............passed When The middle office order number is passed in the commandline as one of the parameters.passed Then Execute the order middle office order..................................passed And Fetch the securities transaction number.................................passed

testcase.classname: Login into T24 and create a buy order
testcase.name: Approve the order with user two
testcase.system-out: Given The user is logged in the back office page............................passed When The back office order number is passed in the commandline as one of the parameters.passed And Choose the cash hold and security hold status...........................passed And Execute the back office order...........................................passed
